summary: Director Tamra Davis pays homage to her friend in this definitive documentary but also delves into Basquiat as an iconoclast. His dense, bebop-influenced neoexpressionist work emerged while... See full summary Â»
cast: Jean Michel Basquiat|Julian Schnabel|Larry Gagosian|Bruno Bischofberger|Tony Shafrazi|Fab 5 Freddy|Jeffrey Deitch|Glenn O'Brien|Maripol|Kai Eric|Nicholas Taylor|Erika Belle|David Bowes|David Bowes|Peter Brant|Kevin Bray|Diego Cortez|Tamra Davis|Al Diaz|America Ferrera|Nelson George|John Giorno|Fred Hoffman|Fred Hoffmann|Michael Holman|Kelle Inman|Becky Johnston|Adam Lindemann|Suzanne Mallouk|Thurston Moore|Annina Nosei|Rene Ricard|Kenny Scharf|Herbert Schorr|Lenore Schorr|Ann Temkin|Robert Farris Thompson|Stephen Torton|Andy Warhol
title: Jean-Michel Basquiat: The Radiant Child
